After Jadeplume Terrorshroom equips this card, immediately use Volatile Spore Cloud once.
Your Jadeplume Terrorshroom, who has this card equipped, can accumulate 1 more stack of Radical Vitality.
(You must have Jadeplume Terrorshroom in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Spore Dust Cloud
splash.description: Few can safely traverse the traps laid by the Fungus with intelligence above that of the average living being.

cards.name: Prophecy of Submersion
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Mona, equip this card.
After Mona equips this card, immediately use Stellaris Phantasm once.
When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the Hydro-Related Reactions you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
(You must have Mona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Mona: Prophecy of Submersion
splash.description:
"Hey! You should be playing that card!"
"...Well, alright then, do what you want."

cards.name: Raven Bow
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Bane of Flame and Water: Raven Bow
splash.description: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. As such, hunters would decorate their bows' limbs with feathers which forebode the imminent death of their targets.

cards.name: Sacrificial Bow
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character (Once per Round)
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Composed: Sacrificial Bow
splash.description: A ceremonial hunting bow that has seen the passage of many years. The trinkets on it are still visible.

cards.name: Sacrificial Fragments
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character (Once per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Composed: Sacrificial Fragments
splash.description: A weathered musical score, the content of which is no longer legible.

cards.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character (Once per Round)
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Composed: Sacrificial Greatsword
splash.description: This greatsword has seen the passage of many years, and was once owned by a clan of brave and gifted warriors who fought hard and died young.

cards.name: Sacrificial Sword
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Elemental Type as this character (Once per Round)
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Composed: Sacrificial Sword
splash.description: This blade was just a prop before its blade was sharpened by the passage of time.

cards.name: Shaken, Not Purred
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Diona, equip this card.
After Diona equips this card, immediately use Icy Paws once.
When your Diona, who has this card equipped, creates a Cat-Claw Shield, its Shield points +1.
(You must have Diona in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Diona: Shaken, Not Purred
splash.description: Shake and stir till its all evenly mixed... and there! Your refill's ready!

cards.name: Skyward Atlas
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Cloud Atlas: Skyward Atlas
splash.description:
Its full name is the "An atlas of the winds and clouds."
This text records the winds and clouds of the northern lands' skies in poetic and archival forms.

cards.name: Skyward Harp
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Echoing Ballad: Skyward Harp
splash.description: The sound of this sky-piercing lyre firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears.

cards.name: Skyward Spine
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Carving Black Wings: Skyward Spine
splash.description: A spear that can hold up the skies. It was this unshakable resolve that sustained the wind dragon through its mortal battle against its vile nemesis.

cards.name: Steady Breathing
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Chongyun, equip this card.
After Chongyun equips this card, immediately use Chonghua's Layered Frost once.
When your Chongyun, who has this card equipped, creates a Chonghua Frost Field, it will have the following effects: Starting Duration (Rounds) +1, will cause your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding charactes' Normal Attacks to deal +1 DMG.
(You must have Chongyun in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Chongyun: Steady Breathing
splash.description: Steady breathing makes a steady heart.

cards.name: Stellar Predator
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Fischl, equip this card.
After Fischl equips this card, immediately use Nightrider once.
When your Fischl, who has this card equipped, creates an Oz, and after Fischl uses a Normal Attack: Deal 2 Electro DMG. (Consumes Usage(s))
(You must have Fischl in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Fischl: Stellar Prerdator
splash.description: "The instant in which Ozvaldo Hrafnavins shows his great might."

cards.name: Stonehide Reforged
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Stonehide Lawachurl, equip this card.
After Stonehide Lawachurl equips this card, immediately use Upa Shato once.
When your Stonehide Lawachurl, who has this card equipped, defeats an opposing character: Stonehide Lawachurl will re-attach Stonehide and Stone Force.
(You must have Stonehide Lawachurl in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Forged From Rock
splash.description: An enduring force flows through that craggy form.

cards.name: Strategic Reserve
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Ningguang, equip this card.
After Ningguang equips this card, immediately use Jade Screen once.
When your Ningguang, who has this card equipped, is on the field, Jade Screen will cause you to deal +1 Geo DMG.
(You must have Ningguang in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Ningguang: Strategic Reserve
splash.description: Abundance is synonymous with confidence.

cards.name: Streaming Surge
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Rhodeia of Loch, equip this card.
After Rhodeia of Loch equips this card, immediately use Tide and Torrent once.
When your Rhodeia of Loch, who has this card equipped, uses Tide and Torrent, all of your Summon(s) gain +1 Usage(s).
(You must have Rhodeia of Loch in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Flowing
splash.description: The racing waters are a display of love toward a deceased deity.

cards.name: The Scent Remained
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Xingqiu, equip this card.
After Xingqiu equips this card, immediately use Fatal Rainscreen once.
When your Xingqiu, who has this card equipped, creates a Rain Sword, its starting Usage(s) +1.
(You must have Xingqiu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Xingqiu: The Scent Remained
splash.description: His penmanship leaves quite the impression.

cards.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
cards.description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Electro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Lightning and Rain: Thunder Summoner's Crown
splash.description: "The song pierced the storm's low hum, ripped through the clouds, and bestowed upon it, light."

cards.name: Thundering Fury
cards.description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Electro Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Electro Dice.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Plume of the Stormy Skies: Thundering Fury
splash.description: "Then I shall sing you another tune — when you come again with thunder and rain!"

cards.name: Thundering Penance
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Keqing, equip this card.
After Keqing equips this card, immediately use Stellar Restoration once.
When your Keqing, who has this card equipped, creates an Electro Elemental Infusion, it will have the following effects: Staring Duration (Rounds) +1, Electro DMG dealt by the attached character +1.
(You must have Keqing in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Keqing: Thundering Penance
splash.description: As long as you're not actually cheating, this is just the name of a card.

cards.name: Transcendent Automaton

After Maguu Kenki equips this card, immediately use Blustering Blade once.
When your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses Blustering Blade, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses Frosty Assault.
(You must have Maguu Kenki in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Marionette Swordmaster
splash.description: That unerring strike has been delivered countless times.

cards.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Traveler's Companion: Traveler's Handy Sword
splash.description: A handy steel sword that contains all manner of useful items in its sheath.

cards.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief

(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.description: "Come sun or rain, nothing could stay the traveling doctor's steps."

When your Ganyu, who has this card equipped, uses Frostflake Arrow: If this Skill has been used before during this match, and it now deals 3 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby instead.
(You must have Ganyu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Ganyu: Undivided Heart
splash.description: First the arrow strikes, and then it turns to frost.

cards.name: Viridescent Venerer
cards.description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Anemo Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Anemo Dice.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Dream of Broken Leaves: Viridescent Venerer
splash.description: "One day, in those boundless hunting grounds... we will meet again."

cards.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
cards.description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Anemo Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Verdant Winds: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
splash.description: "None could ever bestow a crown upon the queen of hunters, for only earth and heaven were higher than she."

cards.name: White Iron Greatsword
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

cards.name: White Tassel

The character deals +1 DMG.
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.description: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

cards.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
cards.description:

(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Sunken Dreams of Yore: Wine-Stained Tricorne
splash.description: "The wine-sodden sea hat was thrust by a storm into the sky, and then carried away on the rolling waves, while those fated to lose their homelands engaged in battles bereft of hope and want."

cards.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
cards.description:
When the character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Pyro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Ashen Lament: Witch's Scorching Hat
splash.description: "...You ashes who dance so wildly, answer me — why have you taken all that I love?"

cards.name: Wolf's Gravestone
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Deal +2 additional DMG if the target's remaining HP is equal or less than 6.
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Mountain Trail: Wolf's Gravestone
splash.description: A longsword said to have been used by the knight of the north wind. It became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

cards.name: Chang the Ninth
cards.description:
When either side uses a Skill: If Physical DMG or Piercing DMG was dealt, or an Elemental Reaction was triggered, this card gains 1 Inspiration.
When this card gains 3 Inspiration, discard this card, then draw 2 cards.

splash.description: "He who has not known poverty has yet to become a true man, and at least this man has books to keep him company!"

cards.name: Chef Mao
cards.description: After playing a Food Event Card: Create 1 random Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Chef Mao, Ingenious Gourmet
splash.description: "We just concern ourselves with making the most delicious food imaginable using everyday ingredients, universally loved flavors, and truly excellent cooking."

cards.name: Dawn Winery
cards.description: When you perform "Switch Character": Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.description: "The best wine will always be brewed next year."

cards.name: Ellin
cards.description: When you use a Skill that has already been used in this Round: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.title: "Knightly Dream" Ellin
splash.description: "I've got to hone my spirit and strength both if my sword arm is to be as steady as Master Jean's!"

cards.name: Favonius Cathedral
cards.description:
End Phase: Heal your active character for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Gathering of the Devout
splash.description: "If you speak sincerely into the wind, your words will surely reach the archon's ear one day."

cards.name: Iron Tongue Tian
cards.description:
End Phase: One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: "Where We Last Left Off" Iron Tongue Tian
splash.description: "Listen, I'll tell you how is it... Let me show you real storytelling tradition!"

cards.name: Jade Chamber
cards.description: Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to match the Elemental Type of your active character.

splash.title: Stargazing Amidst Clouds
splash.description: "They say that it contains a thousand dazzling jewels."

cards.name: Katheryne
cards.description: When you perform "Switch Character": The switch is considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Katheryne, Guild Receptionist
splash.description: "Ad astra abyssosque! Welcome to the Adventurers' Guild."

cards.name: Knights of Favonius Library
cards.description:
When played: Select any Elemental Dice to reroll.
Roll Phase: Gain another chance to reroll.

splash.title: Athenaeum of the North
splash.description: "Most of the books here can be lent out, but do bear in mind that you will have to return them... on time."

cards.name: Liben
cards.description:
End Phase: Collect your unused Elemental Dice (Max 1 of each Elemental Type).
When Action Phase begins: If this card has collected 3 Elemental Dice, draw 2 cards and create Omni Element ×2, then discard this card.

splash.title: "Marvelous Merchandise" Liben
splash.description: Big things are about to happen, big things! Oh, and I have an excellent business proposition for you, so, if I could just have a moment of your time?

cards.name: Liu Su
cards.description:
After you switch characters: If the character you switched to does not have Energy, they will gain 1 Energy. (Once per Round)
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: "In the Next Volume" Liu Su
splash.description: "Well then, dear guests, what would you all like to hear next?"

cards.name: Liyue Harbor Wharf
cards.description:
End Phase: Draw 2 Cards.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Where All Ships Dock
splash.description: "Nature provides, the mountains rejoice, we are blessed by heaven's good grace."

cards.name: NRE
cards.description:
When played: Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck.
When you play a Food Event Card: Draw 1 Food Event Card from your deck. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Emergency Intake: Portable Dish
splash.description: "Regular nutrition helps in case of physical exertion."

cards.name: Paimon
cards.description:
When Action Phase begins: Create Omni Element ×2.
Usage(s): 2

splash.description: "That's right! Your fortune is Paimon's fortune! And vice versa, Paimon's fortune is also your fortune."

cards.name: Parametric Transformer
cards.description:
When either side uses a Skill: If Elemental DMG was dealt this card gains 1 Qualitative Progress.
When this card gains 3 Qualitative Progress, discard this card, then create 3 different Basic Elemental Dice.

splash.title: Perpetual Rotation: Parametric Transformation
splash.description:
"Simply put, everything on this earth and below it has cycles. Memories and elements surge throughout the Ley Lines."
"Perhaps the ancient civilizations were attempting to uncover the cycle that governs the conversion of dust to treasure."

cards.name: Timaeus
cards.description:
Comes with 2 Transmutation Materials when played.
End Phase: Gain 1 Transmutation Material.
When playing an Artifact Card: If possible, spend Transmutation Materials equal to the total cost of the Artifact and equip this Artifact for free. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Timaeus, Scholar of Alchemy
splash.description: "Hello there... Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."

cards.name: Timmie
cards.description:
Triggers automatically once per Round: This card gains 1 Pigeon.
When this card 3 Pigeons, discard this card, then draw 1 card and create Omni Element ×1.

splash.title: "Pure Patience" Timmie
splash.description: "Will pigeons that have flown away come back?"

cards.name: Tubby
cards.description: When playing a Location Support Card: Spend 2 Less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)

splash.title: "Rain Calmer" Tubby
splash.description:
"Steeping a pot of tea, watching over the abode, accompanying the Traveler and Paimon to await the arrival of Ping and the others, watching the cloud-filled sky. These days of not having to concern myself with matters of adeptal import truly are ones of leisure..."
"Oh! Oh dear, I must have fallen asleep again. It's a good thing that no one noticed..."

cards.name: Wagner
cards.description:
Comes with 2 Forging Billets when played.
End Phase: Gain 1 Forging Billet.
When playing a Weapon Card: If possible, spend Forging Billets equal to the total cost of the Weapon and equip this Weapon for free. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Wagner, Blacksmith
splash.description: "Smithing is not dependent on brute strength. You need the sweat on your brow from constant hard work, and perseverance stronger than the metals we forge!"

cards.name: Wangshu Inn
cards.description:
End Phase: Heal the most injured character on standby for 2 HP.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: Dihua Vantage Point
splash.description: "Folk stories also have it that even ones as august as the adepti sometimes bask in the moonlight here."

cards.name: Abyssal Summons
cards.description:
Summon 1 Random Hilichurl Summon!
(You must have at least 2 Monster characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

Random Hilichurl Summon
There are 4 kinds of Hilichurl Summons in total:
Cryo Hilichurl Shooter: Deal 1 Cryo DMG at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
Electro Hilichurl Shooter: Deal 1 Electro DMG at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
Hilichurl Berserker: Deal 1 Pyro DMG at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.
Hydro Samachurl: Deal 1 Hydro DMG at the End Phase. Usage(s): 2.

splash.title: Abyssal Summons
splash.description: "Yaya ika!"

cards.name: Adeptus' Temptation
cards.description:
During this Round, the target character's next Elemental Burst deals +3 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Adeptus' Temptation
splash.description: It is said that this name was derived from this dish's ability to tempt an adeptus to return to the mortal realm. But that begs the question... Which adeptus was that?

cards.name: Blessing of the Divine Relic's Installation
cards.description: Shift 1 Artifact Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters.

splash.title: Divine Relic's Installation
splash.description: "Hehe... Well now, isn't this finally getting interesting?"

cards.name: Calx's Arts
cards.description: Shift 1 Energy from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.

splash.description: "Not to worry. The experiment has been completed, and it is — if I may say so — a great success."

cards.name: Changing Shifts

One of your characters without maximum Energy gains 1 Energy. (Active Character prioritized)
(You must have at least 2 Electro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: High Voltage

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Impetuous Winds

Switch to the target character and create Omni Element ×1.
(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
splash.description: The gale gallops through the woods.

During this Round, your current active character will deal +2 DMG for the next instance.
(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice
splash.description: The frost flower blooms as a heart undivided.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Soothing Water

Heal your active character for 2 HP and all your characters on standby for 1 HP.
(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Soothing Water
splash.description: With purest water flows prosperity.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Sprawling Greenery

Your Burning Flame, Dendro Core, and Catalyzing Field gain +1 Usage(s).
(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery
splash.description: New branches and sprouts grow into a forest.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Woven Flames
cards.description:
Create 1 Pyro Die.
(You must have at least 2 Pyro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Woven Flames
splash.description: The scarlet flame reduces the vanquished to dust.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Woven Ice

Create 1 Cryo Die.
(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Woven Ice
splash.description: Even the sky shall shiver before the ice.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Woven Stone
cards.description:
Create 1 Geo Die.
(You must have at least 2 Geo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Woven Stone
splash.description: The jagged mountains sign a lasting pact.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Woven Thunder
cards.description:
Create 1 Electro Die.
(You must have at least 2 Electro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Woven Thunder
splash.description: Lightning falls on the land of eternity.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Woven Waters
cards.description:
Create 1 Hydro Die.
(You must have at least 2 Hydro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Woven Waters
splash.description: The dance of water nourishes life.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Woven Weeds

Create 1 Dendro Die.
(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Woven Weeds
splash.description: All shall dance in the dream forest.

cards.name: Elemental Resonance - Woven Winds
cards.description:
Create 1 Anemo Die.
(You must have at least 2 Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Elemental Resonance: Woven Winds
splash.description: The wind sings like a leisurely lyre.

cards.name: Guardian's Oath
cards.description: Destroy all Summons. (Affects both you and your opponent.)

splash.title: Evil is Banished
splash.description: "Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call."

cards.name: I Haven't Lost Yet!
cards.description:
Only playable if one of your characters is defeated this Round:
Create Omni Element ×1 and your current active character gains 1 Energy. (Only one copy of I Haven't Lost Yet! can be played each round.)

splash.title: I Haven't Lost Yet!
splash.description: Arataki "He Might Lose but He'll Never Admit Defeatto" is always game for another round!

cards.name: Jueyun Guoba
cards.description:
During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Jueyun Guoba
splash.description: Flavorful and crispy Jueyun Guoba — with Guoba's stamp of approval.

cards.name: Leave It to Me!
cards.description: The next time you perform "Switch Character": The switch will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action.

splash.title: Leave It to Me!
splash.description: "It's fine, leave everything to me!" — This ranks first among "lines to put Mondstadter hearts at ease."

cards.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
cards.description:
During this Round, the target character takes -3 DMG the next time.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Lotus Flower Crisp
splash.description: Dough is formed into bud-like shapes and placed into a pot of oil as if upon the surface of a lake, causing them to slowly bloom layer by layer... A pleasing sight indeed.

cards.name: Master of Weaponry
cards.description: Shift 1 Weapon Equipment Card that has been equipped to one of your characters to another one of your characters of the same Weapon Type.

splash.title: Master of Weaponry
splash.description: "Watch and learn, comrade! A real warrior isn't picky about their weapons!"

cards.name: Minty Meat Rolls
cards.description:
Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks cost 1 less Unaligned Element.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Minty Meat Rolls
splash.description: Though this might be its current form, think about it for a moment: did this dish first start as mint rolled around meat, or meat rolled around mint?

cards.name: Mondstadt Hash Brown
cards.description:
Heal target character for 2 HP.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Mondstadt Hash Brown
splash.description: The sweet taste verifies the famous words of a certain famous gourmet known throughout Teyvat — a dish that may be called a regional specialty cannot taste bad.

cards.name: Mushroom Pizza
cards.description:
Heal target character for 1 HP. For the next two Rounds, heal this character for 1 HP again at the End Phase.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Mushroom Pizza
splash.description: They say that a researcher once used very precise calculations to uncover the "fairest way to cut pizza," but as the process is far too bothersome, basically no one uses it...

cards.name: Northern Smoked Chicken
cards.description:
During this Round, the target character's Normal Attacks cost 1 less Unaligned Element.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Northern Smoked Chicken
splash.description: This dish makes for a warm welcome for guests who come to the northern regions. Now, what manner of guests shall be "treated" to this hospitality this time?

cards.name: Quick Knit
cards.description: Choose one Summon on your side and grant it +1 Usage(s).

splash.title: Patched-Up Bunny
splash.description: 'Tis the secret to Baron Bunny the 893rd's longevity.

cards.name: Send Off
cards.description: Choose one Summon on the opposing side and cause it to lose usages by 2.

splash.title: Send Off
splash.description: "Here at Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, you can count on us to go full send! Satisfaction guaranteed!"

cards.name: Starsigns
cards.description: Your current Active Character gains 1 Energy.

splash.title: Destined Path
splash.description: "This is destiny, and it cannot be defied."

cards.name: Strategize
cards.description: Draw 2 cards.

splash.title: Strategize
splash.description: "This might look quite complicated, but in truth, the possible scenarios do not exceed 187 in number."

cards.name: Sweet Madame
cards.description:
Heal target character for 1 HP.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Sweet Madame
splash.description: Perhaps some have never seen a chicken run... But there's no one who hasn't tried a Sweet Madame!

cards.name: The Bestest Travel Companion!
cards.description: Convert the Elemental Dice spent to Omni Element ×2.

splash.title: The Bestest Travel Companion!
splash.description: "You might be only one of countless stars, but you're Paimon's whole world!"

cards.name: Toss-Up
cards.description: Select any Elemental Dice to reroll. Can reroll 2 times.

splash.title: Toss-Up
splash.description: Before the dice are thrown, none can know their own destiny.

cards.name: When the Crane Returned
cards.description: The next time you use a Skill: Switch your next character in to be the active character.

splash.title: When the Crane Returned
splash.description: "The crane once returned, and once, she was spurned, she turned, and left alone; now, she might be found, with friends all around, to whom she is bound — a home."

cards.name: Wellspring of War-Lust
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Eula, equip this card.
After Eula equips this card, immediately use Glacial Illumination once.
When your Eula, who has this card equipped, uses Icetide Vortex, this will generate 1 more Zeal for Lightfall Sword.
(You must have Eula in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Eula: Wellspring of War-Lust
splash.description: Flood of frost will ensure that vengeance is mine.

cards.name: Tamanooya's Casket
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Kokomi, equip this card.
After Kokomi equips this card, immediately use Nereid's Ascension once.
When your Kokomi, who has this card equipped, uses Nereid's Ascension: If Bake-Kurage is on the field, its Usage(s) will be refreshed.
While Ceremonial Garment exists, Bake-Kurage deals +1 DMG.
(You must have Kokomi in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Sangonomiya Kokomi: Tamanooya's Casket
splash.description: Wisdom yet revealed from the casket parallels tides yet unfolded by the sea.

cards.name: Sin of Pride
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Sara, equip this card.
After Sara equips this card, immediately use Subjugation: Koukou Sendou once.
When Sara is active and has this card equipped, all allied Electro characters with Crowfeather Cover will deal +1 additional Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG.
(You must have Sara in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Kujou Sara: Sin of Pride
splash.description: "With this unity between my mind, arrow, and bow, any enemy will be struck down!"

cards.name: Ornate Kabuto
cards.description:
After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Bygone Lightning: Ornate Kabuto
splash.description: "Thirteen years went by like a dream. The scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke. You have now gone afar."

cards.name: General's Ancient Helm
cards.description:
When Action Phase begins: The character to which this is attached gains Unmovable Mountain that provides 2 Shield points.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Ironclad Promise: General's Ancient Helm
splash.description: "The last drop of blood had soaked into the battlefield, and the glazed sands shone gloriously once more."

cards.name: Arataki Ichiban
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Itto, equip this card.
After Itto equips this card, immediately use Fight Club Legend once.
When your Itto, who has this card equipped, uses Fight Club Legend for the second time or more in one Round: If Superlative Superstrength is triggered, deal +1 additional DMG.
(You must have Itto in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Arataki Itto: Arataki Ichiban
splash.description: Whatever you do, remember to ride the momentum.

cards.name: Kyouka Fuushi
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Ayato, equip this card.
After Ayato equips this card, immediately use Kamisato Art: Kyouka once.
When your Ayato, who has this card equipped, triggers the effects of Takimeguri Kanka, deal +1 additional DMG if the target's remaining HP is equal to or less than 6.
(You must have Ayato in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Kamisato Ayato: Kyouka Fuushi
splash.description: The courtyard remains fragrant even in the bitterest winter.

cards.name: Keen Sight
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Tighnari, equip this card.
After Tighnari equips this card, immediately use Vijnana-Phala Mine once.
When your Tighnari, who has this card equipped, uses Vijnana Suffusion, the character's Charged Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.
(You must have Tighnari in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Tighnari: Keen Sight
splash.description: Mistakes are part of learning... However, these mistakes should be corrected upon being discovered.

cards.name: Favonius Sword
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG
.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: The character gains 1 additional Energy. (Once per Round)
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Windfall: Favonius Sword
splash.description:
"Legend has it that the knight that bore the title of Wolf Pup could cleave even raindrops with his blade, and the gales spurred by his blows were strong enough to snap roses.
Though none could match the heights of the Wolf Pup's prowess, the knights bear his oath of protection yet, his legacy lasting even to the present."

cards.name: Grand Narukami Shrine
cards.description:
Triggers automatically once per Round: Create 1 random Elemental Die.
Usage(s): 3

splash.title: Distant Red Dreams Forlorn
splash.description: "May Mt. Yougou flourish eternal, and may its glory be everlasting."

cards.name: Mystical Abandon
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Shenhe, equip this card.
After Shenhe equips this card, immediately use Spring Spirit Summoning once.
When the Icy Quill created by your Shenhe, who has this card equipped, is triggered by your characters' Normal Attacks, its Usages will not decrease.
(You must have Shenhe in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Shenhe: Mystical Abandon
splash.description: Transfigure, and let my will be embodied!

cards.name: Abyssal Mayhem Hydrospout
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Tartaglia, equip this card.
After Tartaglia equips this card, immediately use Foul Legacy: Raging Tide once.
End Phase: Deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters affected by Riptide
(You must have Tartaglia in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Tartaglia: Hydrospout
splash.description: A reckless yet precise blow.

cards.name: Bunny Triggered
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Amber, equip this card.
After Amber equips this card, immediately use Explosive Puppet once.
After you use a Normal Attack: If this card and Baron Bunny are still on the field, then Baron Bunny explodes and deals 3 Pyro DMG.
(You must have Amber in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Amber: Bunny Triggered
splash.description: "Go go Baron Bunny!"

cards.name: Sanguine Rouge
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Hu Tao, equip this card.
After Hu Tao equips this card, immediately use Guide to Afterlife once.
When your Hu Tao, who has this card equipped, has no more than 6 HP, Pyro DMG dealt +1.
(You must have Hu Tao in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Hu Tao: Sanguine Rouge
splash.description: Director Hu needs a bit more firepower to settle certain unique affairs.

cards.name: Wishes Unnumbered
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Raiden Shogun, equip this card.
After Raiden Shogun equips this card, immediately use Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu once.
When your Raiden Shogun, who has this card equipped, uses Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, it will deal +1 additional DMG for every point of Resolve consumed.
(You must have Raiden Shogun in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Raiden Shogun: Wishes Unnumbered
splash.description: Shine down, baleful omen!

cards.name: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Miko, equip this card.
After Miko equips this card, immediately use Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin once.
After your Miko, who has this card equipped, destroys a Sesshou Sakura through Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin, the next use of Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura this Round will cost 2 less Elemental Dice.
(You must have Miko in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Yae Miko: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
splash.description: "Ah... A sight to behold..."

cards.name: Embrace of Winds
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Venti, equip this card.
After Venti equips this card, immediately use Skyward Sonnet once.
After a Stormzone created by your Venti, who has this card equipped, is triggered, the next Normal Attack performed by your character in this Round will cost 1 less Unaligned Element.
(You must have Venti in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Venti: Embrace of Winds
splash.description: "Watch your step."

cards.name: Conqueror of Evil Guardian Yaksha
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Xiao, equip this card.
After Xiao equips this card, immediately use Bane of All Evil once.
While your Xiao has Yaksha's Mask attached, your use of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling will cost 1 less Anemo Die. (Every attachment of Yaksha's Mask allows the effect to be triggered twice)
(You must have Xiao in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Xiao: Conqueror of Evil
splash.description: Evil shall be dispersed, and the vile will be scattered.

cards.name: Dominance of Earth
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Zhongli, equip this card.
After Zhongli equips this card, immediately use Dominus Lapidis: Striking Stone once.
When your active character is protected by a Shield Character Status or a Shield Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 Geo DMG.
(You must have Zhongli in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Zhongli: Dominance of Earth
splash.description: The vastness of rivers flows endless, perpetual upon the tapestry of eons.

cards.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Nahida, equip this card.
After Nahida equips this card, immediately use Illusory Heart once.
When your Nahida, who has this card equipped, is on the field, the following effects will take place based on your party's Elemental Types:
Pyro: When the Shrine of Maya is on the field, opposing characters who trigger the Seed of Skandha due to Elemental Reactions they are affected by will have the Piercing DMG they take from the Seed of Skandha converted to Dendro DMG.
Electro: When the Shrine of Maya enteres the field, the Seed of Skandha currently present of the opposition will gain 1 Usage(s).
Hydro: After your Nahida, who has this card equipped unleashes Shrine of Maya, Duration (Rounds): +1.
(You must have Nahida in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Nahida: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
splash.description: "Share in my knowledge."

cards.name: Cicin's Cold Glare
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, equip this card.
After Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage equips this card, immediately use Misty Summons once.
After your Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage, who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: If Cryo Cicins' Usage(s) have exceeded their upper limit, deal 2 Cryo DMG.
(You must have Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Cryo Cicin Mage: Cicin's Cold Glare
splash.description:
More Mist Grass means more friendly Cryo Cicins.
...But what happens when the Mist Grass is used up?
Perhaps she never considered this.

cards.name: Embers Rekindled
cards.description:
When played: If Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames, who equips this card, has already triggered Fiery Rebirth, immediately discard this card and apply Aegis of Abyssal Flame to the character.
When Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames, who has this card equipped, triggers Fiery Rebirth: discard this card and apply Aegis of Abyssal Flame to the character.
(You must have Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Abyss Lector: Embers Rekindled
splash.description: The path toward sowing grace is not assured to be one free of obstructions.

cards.name: Absorbing Prism
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Electro Hypostasis, heal that character for 3 HP and attach the Electro Crystal Core to them.
(You must have Electro Hypostasis in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Electro Hypostasis: Absorbing Prism
splash.description:
"Here's our chance!"
"Hey, it's on our side!"

cards.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When your character triggers an Elemental Reaction: Deal +1 DMG. (Max twice per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: A Thousand Nights' Dawnsong: A Thousand Floating Dreams
splash.description:
"There is an appointed time for all things to live and die, just like the ceaseless cycles of night and dawn."
"May the stories within this lamp grant you dreams worth looking forward to."

cards.name: Amos' Bow
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When the character uses a Skill that costs at least a total of 5 Elemental Dice and Energy: +2 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Strong-willed: Amos' Bow
splash.description:
"I dreamt of ocean waves and sand, of lush forests and land."
"I dreamt of boars playing in berry bushes, of a towering spire."

cards.name: Elegy for the End
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Burst: Create Millennial Movement: Farewll Song.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

Millennial Movement: Farewll Song
Your character deals +1 DMG.
Duration (Rounds): 2

splash.title: The Parting Refrain: Elegy for the End
splash.description:
"...But no wind in any season on earth"
"Shall have you gaze upon me again."

cards.name: Skyward Pride
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Sky-rippin: Skyward Pride
splash.description: This is a tale of sky-shaking valor. Bearing the will to defend all, let the wind dragon bestow wrath upon its vile nemesis.

cards.name: The Bell
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
After the character uses a skill: Gives 1 Shield point to your active character. (Once per Round, stacks up to 2 points)
(Only Claymore Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Rebellious Guardian: The Bell
splash.description:
There once was a traitor who brandished a blade against his fallen clan.
Though this individual was eventually cast out from his clan, rumor has that his organization continued their chosen duties.
Legend claims that even the Wolf Pup Rostam might have been involved...

cards.name: Vortex Vanquisher
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When your active character is protected by a Shield Combat Status, you deal +1 DMG.
After the character uses an Elemental Skill: If you have a Combat Status that grants a Shield on your side, add 1 Shield point to that Combat Status. (Once per Round)
(Only Polearm Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Golden Majesty: Vortex Vanquisher
splash.description:
Folklore spoke of a vast shadow entrenched in the depths of the ocean capable of swallowing passing warships...
At tale's end, they believe that Rex Lapis once wielded a spear that pierced the rainbow, pinning the churning vortex that had once terrorized the oceans in the center of the deep sea.

cards.name: Engulfing Lightning
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Triggers automatically once per Round: If the character to which this attached does not have Energy, they will gain 1 Energy.
(Only _WEAPON_ Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Timeless Dream: Engulfing Lightning
splash.description:
The naginata was a lethal weapon by which scattered dross might be cut away.
And the one who wielded that naginata was one who guarded the path to eternity.

cards.name: Skyward Blade
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
Once per Round: This character's Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG. (Once per Round)
(Only Sword Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Sky-piercing: Skyward Blade
splash.description:
The sky-piercing fang. With nemesis vanquished, the wind dragon fell into a deep slumber.
Centuries passed, and Dvalin's sacrifice was all but forgotten by Mondstadt.
A prayer, this sword is. May Dvalin's name be restored.

cards.name: Emblem of Severed Fate
cards.description:
After another character of yours uses an Elemental Burst: The character to which this is attached gains 1 Energy.
The DMG dealt by the character's Elemental Bursts is increased by 2.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Emblem of Severed Fate: Ornate Kabuto
splash.description:
Thirteen years went by like a dream.
The scarlet snow flies through the shadowed pass like smoke.
You have now gone afar.

cards.name: Tenacity of the Millelith
cards.description:
When Action Phase begins: The character to which this is attached gains Unmovable Mountain that provides 2 Shield points.
After this character takes DMG: If the character this card is attached to is the active character, create 1 Elemental Die matching this character's Elemental Type. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact.)

splash.title: Tenacity of the Millelith: General's Ancient Helm
splash.description:
"...To ensure that the afflicted civilians could safely escape, and to maintain their honor in the eyes of the Lord of Geo,
The helmet-clad troops of the front line took the lead, pointing their spears towards the Abyss and charging into battle."

cards.name: Thundering Poise
cards.description:
When the character uses a Normal Attack or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Stilling Calamity: Thundering Poise
splash.description:
"...Tianqiu once played host to a Yaksha, four-armed and mighty."
"He came to The Chasm from afar, to the praises of the tribes."

cards.name: Vermillion Hereafter
cards.description:
When the character uses a Normal Attack or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
After a character is switched to the active character: During this Round, character deals +1 Normal Attack DMG.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Masked Twilight: Vermillion Hereafter
splash.description:
"Do you not hear? The drums die in the north wind, the hero sinks into the vortex."
"Have you not seen? The Yaksha's battle for the dawn — alas for a life so spent."

cards.name: Capricious Visage
cards.description:
When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Preponderant Recollection: Capricious Visage
splash.description:
Even a faint smile could not conceal her sorrow.
Though this is a festive day, it seems more like a farewell...

cards.name: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
cards.description:
When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
If the character has at least 2 Energy, this character's Normal Attacks and Elemental Skills will deal +1 DMG.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

splash.title: Fleeting Iridescence: Shimenawa's Reminiscence
splash.description:
"...Losing one's memory is no different from losing one's life. It is like death amidst darkness eternal."
"Life is full of uncertainty. Love is fleeting, and even lasting memories may be lost..."

cards.name: Tenshukaku
cards.description: When the Action Phase begins: If you have 5 different kinds of Elemental Die, create 1 Omni Element.

splash.title: Omnipresence Over Mortals
splash.description: "What matters is that I tread the path of eternity on my people's behalf."

cards.name: Sangonomiya Shrine
cards.description:
End Phase: Heall all your characters for 1 HP.
Usage(s): 2

splash.title: The Pearlescent Palace
splash.description: "Sangonomiya was once an ocean abyss, until the Great Serpent came, forming a vortex with its spiral movements, and fashioning the coral into an island."

cards.name: Sumeru City
cards.description: When your character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: If you do not have more Elemental Dice than cards in your hand, spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.title: The City Where All Wisdom Resides
splash.description: Under the luxuriant Divine Tree, the sages of the academy city have accumulated all the knowledge there is to be gathered.

cards.name: Vanarana
cards.description:
End Phase: Collect up to 2 unused Elemental Dice.
When Action Phase begins: Reclaim the dice you collected using this card.

splash.title: Abidance of the Forested Path
splash.description: "Enter the memories of the trees in the forest, descend into seedbeds sprouting the dreams of slumbering leaves, and dive into a world free of woes."

cards.name: Chinju Forest
cards.description:
When Action Phase begins: If you do not start first, create 1 Elemental Die that matches the Type of your active character.
Usage(s): 3

splash.title: Abode of Dwelling Demons
splash.description: Legend has it that this sacred forest was once home to many demons.

cards.name: Hanachirusato
cards.description:
When a Summon disappears: This card gains 1 Cleansing Ritual Progress. (Max 3)
When you play a Weapon or Artifact Card: If you already have 3 Cleansing Ritual Progress, discard this card and cause the card you play to cost 2 less Elemental Dice.

splash.title: Persistence of Pain: Hanachirusato
splash.description: "When shall we meet again after this parting? For life is like the morning dew."

cards.name: Kid Kujirai
cards.description: When the Action Phase begins: Create 1 Omni Element. Then if your opponent's Support Zone is not full, transfer this card to your opponent's Support Zone.

splash.title: Temari-Hiding Intentions: Kid Kujirai
splash.description: "When you hide a Temari, you have to hide it within the time of a Temari song. The person who is looking for it will also find it within a song's time. That will make the game fair!"

cards.name: Xudong
cards.description: When playing a Food Event Card: Spend 2 Less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Fulfillment First: Xudong
splash.description: "Hmm? A problem. Agh. We can deal with it after we finish eating."

cards.name: Dunyarzad
cards.description: When playing a Companion Support Card: Spend 2 Less Elemental Dice. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Purity of Trust: Dunyarzad
splash.description: "The point of living is to not leave behind any regrets."

cards.name: Rana
cards.description: After your character uses an Elemental Skill: Create 1 Elemental Die of the same Type as your next off-field character. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Gem of Remembrance: Rana
splash.description: "We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."

cards.name: Red Feather Fan
cards.description: After you switch characters: The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Ineffable Breeze: Red Feather Fan
splash.description:
Legend has it that this fan is capable of unleashing various effects in the hands of a tengu warrior.
But in the hands of an ordinary person, it only possesses the power to "make one's body lighter."
Even so, this degree of power is more than useful for the average individual.

cards.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
cards.description:
After your character uses a skill: This card will accumulate 1 Treasure Clue.
When this card has stored 3 Treasure Clues, discard this card and draw 3 cards.

splash.title: Revelation's Potential: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
splash.description: Strange Seelie capable of guiding people toward treasure. Legend has it that some individuals know how to communicate with these Seelie...

cards.name: Wind and Freedom
cards.description:
In this Round, when an opposing character is defeated during your Action, you can continue to act again when that Action ends.
Usage(s): 1
(You must have at least 2 Mondstadt characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Verse of Unchained Happenings
splash.description: "Someday, the winds will blow towards a brighter future."

cards.name: Stone and Contracts
cards.description:
When the Action Phase of the next Round begins: Create 3 Omni Element.
(You must have at least 2 Liyue characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Contract of Eons Unshaken
splash.description: "This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

cards.name: Thunder and Eternity
cards.description:
Convert all your Elemental Dice to Omni Element.
(You must have at least 2 Inazuman characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Dream of Evanescent Eternity
splash.description: "It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

cards.name: Nature and Wisdom
cards.description:
Draw 1 card. After that, switch any cards in your hand.
(You must have at least 2 Sumeru characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Wisdom of the Joyous Spirits
splash.description: "That dancing circle embodied everything about the universe. Life has always been the end, while it is wisdom that shall be the means."

cards.name: Fatui Conspiracy
cards.description:
Create 1 Fatui Ambusher of a random type on the opponent's field.
(You must have at least 2 Fatui characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

Fatui Ambusher
Fatui Ambushers will trigger their effects after characters on the side of the field they are at use Skills, and will deal DMG to the active character on that side of the field. (Once per Round)
There are 4 kinds of Fatui Ambushers in total:
Cryo Cicin Mage: Deals 1 Cryo DMG when triggered, Usage(s): 2.
Mirror Maiden: Deals 1 Hydro DMG when triggered, Usage(s): 2.
Pyroslinger Bracer: Deals 1 Pyro DMG when triggered, Usage(s): 2.
Electrohammer Vanguard: Deals 1 Electro DMG when triggered, Usage(s): 2.

splash.title: A Conspiracy Under Winter's Resplendence
splash.description: ...But none know the intricacies of what they are plotting.

cards.name: Plunging Strike
cards.description: Combat Action: Switch to the target character. That character then uses a Normal Attack.

splash.title: Fallraid
splash.description: "...Don't deploy your Wind Glider halfway down! You'll get discovered!"

cards.name: Heavy Strike
cards.description:
During this round, your current active character's next Normal Attack deals +1 DMG.
When this Normal Attack is a Charged Attack: Deal +1 additional DMG.

splash.title: The Shatterstone Method
splash.description:
For those that aren't so strong...
It's best to regard the "The Shatterstone Method" as just a "metaphor."

cards.name: The Legend of Vennessa
cards.description: Create 4 basic Elemental Dice of different types.

splash.title: Dream of Freedom Unrelinquished
splash.description:
"Lonely forest breezes converged, jointly they overthrew the tyrant's tower from the sky."
"Broken free from shackles at last, the young lioness stood firm in the winds with her head held high."

cards.name: Friendship Eternal
cards.description: Players with less than 4 cards in their hand draw cards until their hand has 4 cards in it.

splash.title: Bosom Friends
splash.description: Good friends never truly leave. They stay with us in another form.

cards.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
cards.description:
Revives the target character and heals that character for 1 HP.
(You can only revive 1 character via Food per Round, and a character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)

splash.title: Teyvat Fried Egg
splash.description:
With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.
Take care to eat this meal slowly, and avoid choking the throat of destiny when impelled by the fullness of life's vitality.

cards.name: Sashimi Platter
cards.description:
Before this Round ends, the target character's Normal Attacks deal +1 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Sashimi Platter
splash.description:
Under the blade of a master chef, the texture of the ingredients remains pristine. Upon consumption, it is as if something living is leaping inside your mouth...
Hold on, could these ingredients still be...

cards.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
cards.description:
During this Round, all your characters' next Elemental Skills deal +2 DMG.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Tandoori Roast Chicken
splash.description:
The chicken and spices are capable of performing a mysterious Sumeru dance on the tip of your tongue, evoking the image of a festive banquet...
But even a dish so delicious has its last bite, and every feast has its end.

cards.name: Butter Crab
cards.description:
During this Round, all your characters take -2 DMG the next time.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round.)

splash.title: Butter Crab
splash.description:
The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the taste buds so seductively that none can resist its allure.
"Another helping, please!"

cards.name: The Overflow
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Candace, equip this card.
After Candace equips this card, she will immediately use Sacred Rite: Wagtail's Tide once.
When this card is equipped by Candace, her Prayer of the Crimson Crown has the following extra effect: After your character uses a Normal Attack: Deals 1 Hydro DMG. (Once per Round)
(You must have Candace in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Candace: The Overflow
splash.description:
Those who do not respect the regulations at cards...
Are the enemy of all who love the game.

cards.name: Right of Final Interpretation
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yanfei, equip this card.
After Yanfei equips this card, she will immediately use Seal of Approval once.
When Yanfei uses a Charged Attack with this card equipped: Deal +1 DMG to enemies with 6 or less HP.
(You must have Yanfei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Yanfei: Right of Final Interpretation
splash.description: "When it comes to cards... Well, anything is permissible, so long as the rules don't forbid it."

cards.name: Poetics of Fuubutsu
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Kazuha, equip this card.
After Kazuha equips this card, he will immediately use Chihayaburu once.
After Kazuha triggers Swirl with this card equipped: For the next 2 instances, your Characters and Summons will deal +1 DMG for the Elemental Type Swirled. (Each Elemental Type is counted independently).
(You must have Kazuha in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Kaedehara Kazuha: Poetics of Fuubutsu
splash.description:
There is something elegant about this match.
If nothing else, both sides may concede defeat without regrets.

cards.name: Fruit of Fulfillment
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When played: Draw 2 cards. (Once per Round)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Moon's Fullness: Fruit of Fulfillment
splash.description: "Even the most bitter of stories contain courage and strength... The story of the good Golden Nara's adventures with us will help good Nara defend the forest."

cards.name: Master Zhang
cards.description: When playing a Weapon card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. On top of that, for each of your characters already equipped with a Weapon on the field, you spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round.)

splash.title: Arsenal Forge: Master Zhang
splash.description: Much burning frustration must transpire before a hunk of metal may become a keen blade.

cards.name: Ancient Courtyard
cards.description:
You must have a character who has already equipped a Weapon or Artifact: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card in this Round: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: Ancient Courtyard
splash.description: "Is mortal life not an empty shell, as unto a dream?"

cards.name: Covenant of Rock
cards.description:
Can only be played when you have 0 Elemental Dice left: Generate 2 different basic Elemental Dice.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played for the entire game. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: Covenant of Rock
splash.description: "Rex Lapis bestowed him with a pair of eyes to see the world, and came to an agreement with him. The dragon then accompanied the Lord of Geo, fighting campaigns alongside him in the four corners of the world..."

cards.name: Rhythm of the Great Dream
cards.description: The next time you play a Weapon or Artifact card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die.

splash.title: Rhythm of the Great Dream
splash.description:
"Enter our dreams, our world."
"Write of deeds good, brave, and honest."

cards.name: Descent of Divinity
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Albedo, equip this card.
After Albedo equips this card, immediately use Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma.
When there is an Albedo on the field who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has Solar Isotoma, then your characters' Plunging Attack deals +1 DMG.
(You must have Albedo in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Albedo: Descent of Divinity
splash.description: "The process of confirming the strategy for a duel also requires meticulous calculations..."

cards.name: Pulsating Witch
cards.description:
After you switch to Lisa, who has this card equipped: Attach Conductive to the opposing active character. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lisa in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Lisa: Pulsating Witch
splash.description: As a Librarian who has read through tens of thousands of volumes, of course it's trivial for me to remember how to win...

cards.name: Rite of Resurrection
cards.description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Qiqi, equip this card.
After Qiqi equips this card, immediately use Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune once.
After your Qiqi, who has this card equipped, uses Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune, she revives all your fallen characters and heals them for 2 HP. (Can happen 2 times per match).
(You must have Qiqi in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

splash.title: Qiqi: Rite of Resurrection
splash.description: "I must... live on..."

cards.name: King's Squire
cards.description:
The character deals +1 DMG.
When played: The character to which this is attached will spend 2 less Elemental Dice next time they use an Elemental Skill or equip a Talent card.
(Only Bow Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon.)

splash.title: Teachings of the Forest: King's Squire
splash.description:
A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow.
"Remember, this whole world is but a dream of the forest... Please pass on the forest's language and the responsibility of protecting the King's land to future successors."

cards.name: Golden House
cards.description: When you play a Weapon card or an Artifact card with an original cost of at least 3: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)

splash.title: Golden House
splash.description: All the contracts that circulate throughout the land are forged here.

cards.name: Setaria
cards.description: After you perform any action, if you have 0 cards in your hand: Draw 1 card.

splash.title: Crossing the Wall: Setaria
splash.description: A genius from the desert, deep within the rainforest's temple...

cards.name: Joyous Celebration
cards.description:
Your active character must be one of the following elemental types to play this card: Cryo/Hydro/Pyro/Electro/Dendro.
The element corresponding to your active character's Elemental Type will be applied to all your characters.
(Only one "Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)

splash.title: Joyous Celebration
splash.description: "Celebration should be shared with everyone."

cards.name: Where Is the Unseen Razor
cards.description:
Return a Weapon card equipped by your character to your Hand.
During this Round, the next time you play a Weapon card: Spend 2 less Elemental Dice.

splash.title: Where Is the Unseen Razor?
splash.description: The origins of this Branch Master of the Adventurers' Guild are shrouded in mystery, yet she keeps looking for clues about the sword, constantly challenging powerful enemies along the way...
